meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Whitaker Bert Rubini Jesse Cuevas Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6008.

td.p: Sarah Whitaker, a dean's assistant originally from Jackson, Michigan
Bert Rubini, a chemistry professor from St. Petersburg, Florida
Jesse Cuevas, a corporate lawyer originally from Leawood, Kansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,000)

tr.td: STATES' SECOND-LARGEST CITIES
SITCOM MOMS
POLL-POURRI
THE NUMBER OF YEARS FROM...
SUV NAMES
ABBREVIATED JOBS & DEPTS.

tr.td: Jesse
Bert
Sarah
AMERICAN HISTORY
FILMOGRAPHIES
KNIGHTS OF THE DICTIONARY?
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with a "sir" sound.)
MYTHICAL TOOLS & ACCESSORIES
ECO-FRIENDLY VAMPIRES
BET YOU DIDN'T SEE THAT ONE COMING

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
